name: collegially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves or shows friendly and helpful relationships between colleagues (= people who work together): He strongly believes that the US should work closely and collegially with other countries. At every step in the process I was treated wonderfully, collegially, and inclusively, by everyone involved.
More examplesFewer examplesOne of the criticisms of the administration is that it's not operating collegially. A study group can show teachers how to learn and work collegially.The questioning sessions were conducted as collegially as possible.
